Functionality: 3 tabs: project tab, sounds wave tab, markers tab. Can open new track, has custom file explorer. Automatically saves markers for track. Works only on macOs. User can manually load markers for a current track.
Can automatically save markers for a track.
Can open the file (mp3, wav) - Project tab.
Can show markers list. Able to play from selected marker.
Can see grouped buttons and 3 tabs. Project tab placholder, sound wave tab, markers tab.
Can place markers on the sound wave, edit or remove them.
Can scroll the sound wave, able to zoom.
Can render the sound wave, and play from cursor.
